message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that "Administrative Expenses" is the line item that corresponds to the costs of general management and administration. This line appears in the statement with a value of 1597051.08 on 2024-01-28.

Administrative expenses typically include costs related to the general management and administration of a company, such as executive salaries, office expenses, legal and accounting fees, and other overhead costs that are not directly tied to production or sales activities.

Therefore, the value for costs of general management and administration is 1597051.08.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1597051.08'}}
```
